briefTitle: Monitoring and Predicting Breast Cancer Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Response Using Diffuse Optical Spectroscopic Imaging
officialTitle: Monitoring and Predicting Breast Cancer Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy Response Using Diffuse Optical Spectroscopic Imaging
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Diagnostic Tool Breast Cancer Response to Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female, 18 years of age or older, non pregnant or nursing.
* Diagnosis of breast cancer and will be receiving chemo therapy treatments

Exclusion Criteria:

* 18 years of age or younger, pregnant or nursing.
* Previous treatment including chemo therapy, radiation, surgery, and hormone therapy.
* Previous diagnosis with other form of cancer.
